codeGet:
SELECT DISTINCT
       ROWIDTOCHAR (a.ROWID)                                     "id"
      ,a."SPREMRG_PIDM"
      ,a."SPREMRG_PRIORITY"
      ,a."SPREMRG_LAST_NAME"
      ,a."SPREMRG_FIRST_NAME"
      ,a."SPREMRG_MI"
      ,a."SPREMRG_STREET_LINE1"
      ,a."SPREMRG_STREET_LINE2"
      ,a."SPREMRG_STREET_LINE3"
      ,a."SPREMRG_CITY"
      ,a."SPREMRG_STAT_CODE"
      ,a."SPREMRG_NATN_CODE"
      ,a."SPREMRG_ZIP"
      ,a."SPREMRG_PHONE_AREA"
      ,a."SPREMRG_PHONE_NUMBER"
      ,a."SPREMRG_PHONE_EXT"
      ,a."SPREMRG_RELT_CODE"
      ,a."SPREMRG_ACTIVITY_DATE"
      ,a."SPREMRG_ATYP_CODE"
      ,a."SPREMRG_DATA_ORIGIN"
      ,a."SPREMRG_USER_ID"
      ,a."SPREMRG_SURNAME_PREFIX"
      ,a."SPREMRG_CTRY_CODE_PHONE"
      ,a."SPREMRG_HOUSE_NUMBER"
      ,a."SPREMRG_STREET_LINE4"
      ,a."SPREMRG_SURROGATE_ID"
      ,a."SPREMRG_VERSION"
      ,a."SPREMRG_VPDI_CODE"
      ,a."SPREMRG_GUID"
      ,a."SPREMRG_PHONE_AVAIL_GUID"
      ,a."SPREMRG_EMERGENCY_GUID"
      ,a1.gorsdav_value.accessVARCHAR2 ()                        EMAIL_ADDRESS
      ,a2.gorsdav_value.accessVARCHAR2 ()                        TELEPHONE_TYPE
      ,MAX (NVL (SORFOLK_PARENT_EMPLOYER, 'NO'))
           OVER (PARTITION BY SPREMRG_PIDM, SPREMRG_PRIORITY)    ACADEMIC_CK
      ,MAX (NVL (SORFOLK_PARENT_JOB_TITLE, 'NO'))
           OVER (PARTITION BY SPREMRG_PIDM, SPREMRG_PRIORITY)    FINANCIAL_CK
  FROM spremrg  a
      ,gorsdav  a1
      ,gorsdav  a2
      ,sorfolk  folk
 WHERE     1 = 1
       AND spremrg_pidm = :parm_user_pidm
       AND (spremrg_priority = :spremrg_priority OR :spremrg_priority IS NULL)
       AND a1.gorsdav_table_name(+) = 'SPREMRG'
       AND a1.gorsdav_attr_name(+) = 'EMAIL_ADDRESS'
       AND a1.gorsdav_pk_parenttab(+) =
           SPREMRG_pidm || CHR (1) || SPREMRG_PRIORITY
       AND a2.gorsdav_table_name(+) = 'SPREMRG'
       AND a2.gorsdav_attr_name(+) = 'TELEPHONE_TYPE'
       AND a2.gorsdav_pk_parenttab(+) =
           SPREMRG_pidm || CHR (1) || SPREMRG_PRIORITY
       AND folk.sorfolk_pidm(+) = SPREMRG_pidm
       AND folk.SORFOLK_PARENT_LAST(+) = SPREMRG_LAST_NAME
       AND folk.SORFOLK_PARENT_FIRST(+) = SPREMRG_FIRST_NAME
       AND NVL (folk.SORFOLK_PARENT_MI(+), '@') = NVL (SPREMRG_MI, '@')
       AND folk.SORFOLK_RELT_CODE(+) = SPREMRG_RELT_CODE;
